website_summaries.verdict: Cleaning tools and a headlight sweeten the deal, but many with bad joints find this vacuum too heavy for practical use.
pros: Comes with crevice tool and dusting brush
Boost mode provides more power for extra cleaning
cons: Some customers are disappointed with battery life and suction power

customer_reviews.title: Weak & not worth half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Reach wand part missing. On low setting battery lasts about 20 mins. On high setting, lasts about15 mins. Very very disappointed with this item. Low setting does not pick up tiny bits of cotton & high setting also still does not pick up small pieces of cotton or dog hair. I'm disabled & cannot return this item to a post office, i am high risk with this covid19 & at present am not allowed out until august also i have no vacuum cleaner at all now as I gave my GTech away to a friend....i sincereley wish i had kept it now. Please make arrangements immediately to have it picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum and am going to return it, it is so uncomfortable to use it cannot stand up on its own so has to be constantly carried about, I have just about 3 times and the brushes at the bottom are covered in hair and fluff, there is no sun toon it doesn’t even lift the smallest of stones that are carried it!!! I cannot get it taken apart unless I stop it and place on a bench and need 2 hands to do this!!! Not worth the money, useless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Davidson

customer_reviews.title: This is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: After having a Hettie for years and years, that finally stopped working properly, I thought I would try a cordless and looked a lots and lots of reviews and finally decided on this Vax I don't know if I've been spoilt by how amazing Hettie was but seriously this vacuum is useless and it isn't cheap either Wish I hadn't bothered - if you put it on high suction the battery lasts literally seconds and if you don't have it on the highest suction it doesn't pick anything up
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and comfortable to use with longlife battery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered that for my sister as she has no account but she let me tried it when arrived and I need to say I am really impressed. It is very strong and powerful vacuum cleaner, battery charging fast and also has indicator so whe know exactly when needs to be charge. Also what I like it that you can take apart a dust bin and emptied and you do not have to lift whole vacuum cleaner to do it. Vacuuming is very easy and smooth especially when you press an extra button and rotate brush starts working Edit: after using that for a week I decided to send it back, I found out it is a bit too heavy
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous help!
customer_reviews.text: Great little help around the house for the little jobs with crumbs and hairs. This is not suitable to hoover a whole house this is a little fabulous helper to keep things in check dust, crum and hair free floors. Love the separate button for extra power head brush. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Castelo

customer_reviews.title: Effective and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: Superb vac. Light & very powerful. Easy to assemble, great accessories. Convenient to use all over the house with no need to top up charge. To empty is straight forward, just make sure you are directly over bin or bag when doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Steve King

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with battery life
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews we settled on this Vax vac for many reasons including that it was cordless and lightweight, so with my disability its easy to use. However, I'm quite disappointed with the battery life which doesn't seem to last very long. I seem to have to recharge basically after every use. Our previous vax vac actually came with 2 batteries and was less expensive than this one and I've wondered why the same couldn't be done with this one?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas Booth

customer_reviews.title: Will buy Vax again ,but hope I dont have to for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this cleaner. Delivery was very quick. Couldn't fault anything.Best cleaner I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. F. Shaddick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It is more powerful than I thought it would be and the suction does not diminish as it fills. The battery is easy to remove and charge, and it is very easy to empty. The rotating head and the lack of a cable make it perfect for more difficult to reach places, dusty corners and under furniture. It picked up more dirt than I thought was on my carpets!
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: The blade is worth the money when you consider the price of a dyson
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought the vax blade from the first one they made but unfortunately i do prefer my blade 2 has it seems to hold more battery life and better suction power than the blade 3. If you are going for the blade 3 my advice would be purchase the blade 4 where you will get a better longer battery life 4.0 battery instead of a 3.0 battery plus the blade 4 seems to have a better suction power also. I have noticed that blade 3 is more noisy than my blade 2
customer_reviews.author: Bellabell

customer_reviews.title: Vax not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Having bought Vax for years very disappointed with this model. The battery fails to charge after only having for 5 months and trying to get assistance from customer support at Vax is extremely slow and still not resolved. 5 years ago Vax would resolve a problem instantly but their vaccums were built to last then. Nowadays this one lasted 5 months and the previous one 18. It’s time to find a new brand! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Evans

customer_reviews.title: A Good Lightweight Cordless Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this, on high power very good suction for stubborn areas. On normal power ok for most areas, on this mode, good battery life. The idea is to use high power on stubborn areas and switching back to normal power elsewhere, doing this gives you good battery life. Slightly too heavy, but still a lightweight vacuum. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mathison JR

customer_reviews.title: Great sucker! Believe me!
customer_reviews.text: Suction only strong when on the actual floor. If you use your hand to check it, it probably won't feel that strong. Believe me it is! So much so it has sucked the corners of my laminate flooring joints off. This is not the manufacturers or seller fault of course. If you use the boost or the brush setting it will use battery real fast. But looks good and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great hoover which is really easy to use, it's much better than a corded Hoover. The battery life is reduced when you increase the power but that's not really a problem, it still lasts so that I can clean my whole house
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it seems to do the job very well, i bought it to vacuum under the beds and up stairs, done the stairs very well, but, only one problem, the battery life, on normal power it's ok, but on turbo it does not last as long, normal power does not seem to be as good, but I'm sure it's the same for other makes, would have been nice if it came with 2 batteries but you can buy spares, but maybe if i did the whole house i would buy another battery, but overall I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: jwk58

customer_reviews.title: Poor on carpets short battery
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but felt compelled to warn others not to buy this hoover. It cleans hard floors fine but is useless on carpets and doesn't pick up fluff at all. Battery life is poor as you need to have it on high suction for it to work. Waste of money and makes cleanings long process with all the battery recharging. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Superb suction, light as a feather!
customer_reviews.text: It is a fabulous lightweight machine, very easy to use. I really love using it, I have a larger VAX too but this is so useful it gets in all the corners and works like a dream. The different modes too are useful, a suction boost, works well at getting the dust up from the gaps in floorboards etc.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan6

customer_reviews.title: Over the moon
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my retired dad and this has enabled him to do the hoovering more regular. Before it was a strenuous task with old bulky hoover. 10 out of 10 by the old man
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This does not do what it is supposed  to
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadnt bought this vax. It does not do what it says - it does not pick up bits of fluff from the carpet although it picks up bigger bits from a tiled floor. It hurts your hand between the thumb and finger as you have to hold it quite tight to manage it. Rubbish for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr DRJ Boyton

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is bad even though I’ve only used it twice since having it. I have the battery on charge overnight so it’s fully charged and with it on full power the battery drains so fast and wouldn’t be charged enough if you were to vaccum a house with it on full power
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made prone to breaking
customer_reviews.text: Battery and charger didn't work. Sent me a new one. Battery still rubbish. They won't accept it yet I have documentary evidence. It runs about 7 minutes before it runs out. Not recommended. Now the dirt container latch has broken. In fairness vax customer service is excellent and they've sent me replacements promptly. But I could do without the hassle. If they maked them properly in the first place I'd pay more!
customer_reviews.author: watcher

customer_reviews.title: Battery runs out: 5 minutes of use on max settings
customer_reviews.text: 1. Very disappointed with this product! Battery issue: battery runs out with less than 5 minutes use on maximum vaccume setting. No wonder they recommended to buy second battery for £75. 2. Plenty of hair becomes jammed on spinning roller brush: giving us extra difficult job of removing hairs. 3. Suction on normal low settings is poor. High setting is okay but battery will run out in less than 5 minutes. I would rather purchase vacuum with power cable to eliminate battery issue and spend a little extra for powerful suction.
customer_reviews.author: V.S

customer_reviews.title: Need to purchase spare battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is appalling. Definitely need two batteries but a spare battery is around 70 pound . Like the design. Only use this now for hard to reach ceiling and skirting as I run out of battery for floor hoovering. One bed, bathroom, open plan kitchen lounge.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Quite impress with how much it pick up. Battery enough to do 2-3 rooms on max power. Cleaning the barrel and brush head is so easy. Have bought popular and pricier cordless. Though it's slightly have more weight still great value for money and can't praise it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless hoover
customer_reviews.text: Great cordless hoover allows me to hoover all the house, tiled floor and carpet in one charge of battery, i love the additional light which can be on or off. The additional suction boost is a great addition as well, love it
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Problem returning
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using your code but the post office tell me the box dimensions 76x56x26 are too big for the code given. ???
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: A major let down!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a dyson. I have to say this was not a patch on it, it struggled to pick up the basic bits, however it had 3 settings. If you put it on the maximum power setting it would pick up. Unfortunately the battery would only last around 5 minutes maximum. Neede to charge after every vacuum. I would not recommend this vacuum at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Postin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and light.
customer_reviews.text: Brill if or our holiday home, picks up well and stores on a clip inside a cupboard. Charging is easy as battery removes. Not a huge cylinder for the debris but good for my use.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums pet hair well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very good suction, gets the dog hair off the carpet well. Very flexible head. The hand unit is heavier than I expected but still ok to use. Im 72 & managed it ok.
customer_reviews.author: S Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Ok ish
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after a faulty Shark. I find it difficult to take the hoover part away from the stick part. Anyone who has problems with their hands or someone who doesn't have much strength would struggle. Suction isn't as good as the Shark
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Efficient cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on behalf of a friend, but anyway, she finds it works really well and doesn’t take up much space. However, it’s heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Walpole

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my Vax. Powerful suction and very efficient with powered head, I have not had needed to use the power boost feature.
customer_reviews.author: John Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but a little bit on heavy side, despite this, quality product, good battery life and good suction, great for stairs and car. Very good value
customer_reviews.author: Lef

customer_reviews.title: Vax one battery
customer_reviews.text: I gave the vax a really good test run, having 5 cats this hover is perfect. The suction is brilliant and my carpet looks cream again. The battery charges quickly and the vax is perfect for busy households like mine. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps you of your feet at the same time it cleans
customer_reviews.text: Very good value and a good cleaner if I could I would marry it
customer_reviews.author: mr paul lulham

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this vac, battery life could be better. But it does a very good job of most floors.
customer_reviews.author: No1Bruce fan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is brilliant on this, especially with its different settings and the battery lasts plenty long enough to finish a job. It is slightly heavy and can get a bit tiring after using it continuously for more then 10 minutes but that is not noticeable if you are using this for quick and regular jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Himayak Dhar

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was a complete waste of money DO NOY BUY
customer_reviews.author: Pauline H

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is very poor, doesn't clean one room, had to buy a second more powerful battery which makes the vacuum an expensive buy
customer_reviews.author: mickt

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Just fabulous my husband now does all the hoovering lol quick and easy just to grab and go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Really unimpressed with the suction power, I have a full wooden floor and it can struggle to pick up basic bits of dirt/dust. When I place against hand also can feel the lack of power. Pretty sad I spent my money on it and forgot to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: alex bowley

customer_reviews.title: Even better than hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: The Vac Blade 3 is just right for me - lightweight, powerful and easy to use. And no cord to tangle around my ankles!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Excell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly heavy. I probably wouldn't have ordered it if I knew how heavy it was.
customer_reviews.author: claresexypink

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not a dyson
customer_reviews.text: Run time 20 mins just about vacuums the whole house. Does the job but not overly impressed
customer_reviews.author: Raveen R.

customer_reviews.title: Lively product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely easy to use and helps me with my bad back
customer_reviews.author: Terri Tilbury

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful vacuum cleaner. It is very powerful and it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I makes life a lot easier for me.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way I can use it anywhere, and battery led not run out on me, this was what I was concerned about..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not all together happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than we really wanted, battery doesn’t last that long, separating the pipes a bit awkward and battery not easy to remove from charger. Suction is good and articulation pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: john wrench

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning, probably need 2 or 3 batteries if cleaning larger houses
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning, probably need 2 or 3 batteries if cleaning larger houses
customer_reviews.author: MeDan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Can anyone help me with this please but the weel has come off and winding If is replaced or do I need to pay for a hole new hoover
customer_reviews.author: Chris brown

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cordless hoover. Does the job. Just wish the battery lasts longer. But overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nilu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sucks brilliantly. It can be a little heavy when used for a long time but I do suffer from arthritis in my elbows so may be fine for many people . Great product and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Its top heavy, not beautifully balanced as advertised. Battery life is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: k bates

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: The main function did not work, so requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is very poor. It’s slightly better when using the nozzle rather than the wider hoover head. I would not recommend, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not good
customer_reviews.text: Ok suction but only on high power. Battery life is rubbish- approx 10-15 minutes which is about enough to do the downstairs
customer_reviews.author: jasonmoore

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to use and emptying with good suction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it especially as it is so much cheaper than comparable machine and does same jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Paris

customer_reviews.title: no good for job
customer_reviews.text: no suction at the time of use sent it back waiting for money back
customer_reviews.author: dave prince

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on a narrow boat Easy to use Enough battery life to do the whole interior Very good at picking up dog hair !
customer_reviews.author: B SILLS

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: Requires boost mode to get good suction otherwise poor suction. Battery life with boost mode is short.
customer_reviews.author: J Protasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: poor product
customer_reviews.text: poor suction. dust case keeps coming off very poor product for the money. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great cordless vacuum. Good enough to replace main household vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Claire Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and easy to empty
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it’s cordless. I use it all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Farina

customer_reviews.title: Vax one
customer_reviews.text: Good but not as powerful as I thought it would be. Does not last very long on full power
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McNae

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Am a bloke it’s a hoover!! But really it‘a fantastic!! Simple
customer_reviews.author: Tom Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Hoover
customer_reviews.text: Really light and quite a good pick up for cordless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Easy to assemble and easy to use.e
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very good vacuum highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it has made our lives so much easier. We have a very hairy dog and wooden flooring and it is so easy now to just whip round with the vac. Easily cleaned and nice little wall mount. Negative side is it struggles on deep shag carpets and rugs and will cut out. This is on one hand a nice little safety feature to stop the motor burning out. Overall very good on short pile and wooden floors. Battery at full power and with roller going is about 15 minutes which is fine for us. Would last longer on normal power and without roller turning.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Walker

customer_reviews.title: Deplorable service
customer_reviews.text: Vax is okay, I would say just below Dyson in all respects, but less than half the price. Delivery however was shocking. Waited in all day for it and it didn't show. Alexa said it was delivered? Around 8.30 pm my neighbour from 2 houses away brought it round absolutely soaking wet! He'd found it outside when he went to lock the gate and had no clue it was there! Amazon, these drivers may be cheap but for gods sake at least get some who know what numbers are, or a little training may help!
customer_reviews.author: DB Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Really good suction!
customer_reviews.text: Mum loves it, bought for convenience of use, mostly for her stairs as she was having problems with corded hoover....she can't stop gushing about it...I have one for my office too, love how easy it is to use, empty, and simply no fuss. Battery runs on high for about 25 mins, longer on regular power, perfect for everyday areas and messes, fabulous for stairs and the car. Works great on wood, carpet and tile. Basically a very handy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hard floors
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and maneuver. It’s a bit loud with the brush on, but it does a good job. It works a lot better than other stick vacuums I’ve tried. I’m only using it on hard floors and furniture, and it works just as well as a full size Hoover for that. I wish the attachments for my old Vax were compatible!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Quick whip round
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery.. lovely for a quick whip round, but I am and older person, and find it a bit heavy after a time. Definitely cant hold it up for cieling cobwebs ect.. battery doesn't last long either.. as I said it's ok for a quick whip round though. But not for a good clean up.
customer_reviews.author: jance pauline berry

customer_reviews.title: Battery life too short, weight too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I only have a 2 bedroomed flat, with oak floors in the living areas and just the bedrooms carpeted. The battery rarely lasts the entire floor area. I find the weight too heavy even swopping hands. I am not old or feeble, just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover!
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought my carpets were hoovered before. It would seem not! This hoover picks up so much dust /dirt from the floor. Really lightweight. I can do my entire house on one charge. Really good hoover all in all!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Useful for every day cleaning. Easy to use and empty. Love the extra brush power. Great for all the dog hairs. Well made and light enough for a shorter person like me.
customer_reviews.author: Teeen

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful and short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this vacuum based on the reviews and the price. However, the charge really doesn't last that long (battery began to die after about 20 minutes of vacuuming my living room). The suction isn't particularly strong either. Even on the higher setting, using the shortest attachment, the vacuum struggled to suction small bits off the carpet. Not sure if I got a defective vacuum but certainly wouldn't recommend at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Aku Odunton

customer_reviews.title: Bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. Fairly heavy. Suction not that great. Battery doesn’t last long enough.. top heavy so if you don’t put it in its stand it will fall over
customer_reviews.author: Tomsky

customer_reviews.title: Good but a tad heavy..
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my vax cordless , just right for our two bed bungalow , a bit on the heavy side for two people in their late 70,s but all in all really good..
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Light easy to use charges quickly
customer_reviews.text: Likes this light weight cleaner has a quick charge, very manoeuvrable and best of all no trailing cable. Easy to empty love it.
customer_reviews.author: junio

customer_reviews.title: So handy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this vacuum. Easy to use and easy to clean. Does everything it promises. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Returned as it was too heavy to handle by an elderly relative. Not used so not sure of saction Power or battery Life.
customer_reviews.author: Louka

customer_reviews.title: Great suction battery life so so
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this battery was gonna be good, its only lasting 20 mins if that. Its only 4 days old now and was charged 24 hours before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good device to have around
customer_reviews.text: Is a great device, the down side is the battery, doesn't last very long. For the car is been very good.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after a month
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, hardly used and stopped charging after 1 month. Having to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good vac but the battery doesn’t last very long about 10 min on full power so if I’d of known that I would of got a wired one
customer_reviews.author: gemma sunter

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like alot. Very good suction. Light weight. Many thanks Graham.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Food hoover buy heavy
customer_reviews.text: Food hoover heavy though so would not do anyne that can't really lift
customer_reviews.author: lorraine MacFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Good cordless hoover
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not as good as first thought but good cordless
customer_reviews.author: Curt francis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and lightweight. The only downside to this product is when you use it on high power it sucks the life out of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: It is much heavier than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love my new vacuum. Very easy to assemble n use .
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: Poor suction for price. Added £10 and found a brilliant Dyson on sale.
customer_reviews.author: T.Smith

customer_reviews.title: My VAX hoover
customer_reviews.text: I love my hoover very much indeed I never thought I would get one I am really honoured the way it works I would definitely recommend one of those to anybody. I love my hoover very much indeed I never thought I would get one I am really honoured the way it works I would definitely recommend one of those to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

product_meta.title: Vax OnePWR Blade 3 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: Style Name:Blade 3MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING PERFORMANCE VAX Blade 3 provides multi-surface cleaning performance with no loss of suction. Our specially designed floorhead complements our powerful motor, ensuring optimal pick up on all floor surfaces. NO LOSS OF SUCTION VAX Blade 3 maintains constant high pick-up performance even when the dirt bin is full or the battery is low. LIGHTWEIGHT AND INNOVATIVE DESIGN At just 3.1kg, VAX Blade 3 is perfectly balanced for effortless, easy to use cleaning. Offering the performance of a corded vacuum in a sleek lightweight design. REMOVABLE ONEPWR 3.0 Ah BATTERY Generating up to 40 minutes runtime per battery, there is plenty of time to clean without recharging. VAX Blade 3 provides continuous cleaning performance and, if that is not enough, you can simply switch out for another ONEPWR battery and keep going VAX BLADE 3 REMOVABLE BIN Simple, hygienic and easy emptying. No more awkward manoeuvring or unnecessary carrying of your whole machine to the bin when you need to empty the debris. Simply pop off the removable bin and empty. 2.5 HOUR FAST CHARGE Ready to use in just 2.5 hours, or less if you just need a quick clean. DUSTVAULT 3 stage filtration technology ensures that even the smallest particles of dust are captured in the dirt bin, dual cyclones remove dust, and a dual layer electrostatic filter captures the finest particles. DIRECT HELIX TECHNOLOGY Provides three-dimensional support inside the horizontal dirt bin, this also intersects with the axis of the cleaning wand giving a direct air path from the floor to the cyclone for maximum performance and efficiency. WHOLE HOME CLEANING The lightweight, detachable handheld is perfect for stairs, pet hair removal, cars and upholstery cleaning. The cleaning wand is easy to elevate into those hard to reach areas, yet flexible enough to reach all those awkward spots – up high, down low or in-between. BOOST MODE Up to 3x the power† at the touch of a button giving you the very best cleaning performance, when you really need it. CORDLESS CONVENIENCE ON ALL FLOOR TYPES The specially designed floorhead on VAX Blade 3 gives you excellent cleaning performance on all types of flooring. VAX Blade 3 is cordless meaning you can move from surface to surface or room to room without the hassle of plugging and unplugging. Tested according to IEC 62885-2:2016 clause 5.7 and 5.9. †† Tested in standard power mode on hard floor, with floor brush switched off. † Maximum suction power, tested according to IEC 62885-2:2016 clause 5.8. Tested in Boost Mode. * UK market data, Oct 2018 - Sep 2019 (by sales volume), when tested on carpet and hard floor according to IEC 62885-2:2016 clauses 5.2 and 5.3. Tested in Boost Mode.
feature_bullets: The cleaning performance of the UK’s best-selling corded uprights* & Twice the boost-mode runtime of the UK’s best-selling cordless vacuum**
Multi-surface cleaning performance with no loss of suction
At just 3.1kg, VAX Blade 3 is perfectly balanced for effortless, easy to use cleaning
Removable ONEPWR 3.0 Ah battery generates up to 40 minutes runtime
3 Year Guarantee for peace of mind
